verbs.description: [ARG0: The lawsuits] [V: seeking] [ARG1: many thousands of dollars in damages] are piling up against the owner of the red , white and blue " Trump House " in western Pennsylvania .
The lawsuits seeking many thousands of dollars in damages [V: are] piling up against the owner of the red , white and blue " Trump House " in western Pennsylvania .
